message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $13,000 to start.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $13,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
Alice, thank you for your offer. Given my current financial situation, I am still only able to consider a price of $9,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
